email: Please enter a valid email address!
maxLength: This field must be less than {maxLength} characters!
minLength: Password must be at least {{ min }} characters long
lowercase: Password must include at least one lowercase letter
uppercase: Password must include at least one uppercase letter
number: Password must include at least one number
symbol: Password must include at least one symbol
noAccents: Password must not contain Vietnamese accents
differentFromUsername: Password must be different from your username
differentFromCurrent: New password must be different from current password
passwordPolicy: The new password cannot duplicate any of the last {{ value }} passwords
minLengthNoSpacesOrVietnamese: At least {{ value }} characters with no space or Vietnamese accents
includePasswordCriteria: Include lowercase, uppercase, numerals and symbols, except “ ‘ -
